name: Daycie S.
review: I am new to Real Estate. Kristina has gone above and beyond for me. She has made me feel welcome, she's spent a lot of extra time answering questions, provided positive helpful feedback, she's helped set me up with opportunities to meet other professionals within the field, and has been so supportive to help me set up my first contract. I know with her help and guidance that I will be able to set my best foot forward and to be successful in this industry. Thank you Kristina.
